title: Elmish Land Configuration
description: Configuration file for Elmish Land applications

view.description: Configures the view layer and UI library used by your application

module.description: The F# module that contains your view types and elements. By default, Elmish Land uses Feliz for building React UIs.

type.description: The type used for view elements in your application. This corresponds to the return type of your view functions.

textElement.description: The function used to create text elements in your views. Used by the CLI when scaffolding new pages.

projectReferences.description: An array of relative paths to additional F# project files (.fsproj) that should be referenced by your Elmish Land application. Useful for sharing code across multiple projects or using custom types in routes.

items.description: Relative path to an F# project file (.fsproj)

serverCommand.description:
Experimental, may change or be removed in the future! Custom command to run when executing 'elmish-land server'. The string is split on whitespace - first token is the executable, remaining tokens are arguments.

Example: "npm run dev" will execute npm with arguments ["run", "dev"]

viewType.description: DEPRECATED: Use 'view.type' instead. This field is maintained for backward compatibility with older configurations.
